SELECT post_id, profile_img, member_id, content, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM ( SELECT s.post_id ,s.member_id ,m.profile_img ,s.content ,s.thumbnail ,s.likes ,s.cmts
FROM sns_post s JOIN member m ON(s.member_id = m.member_id)
WHERE m.role in (1,3) ORDER BY likes DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, s.* FROM sns_post s WHERE ROWNUM < #{ num }+6 ) WHERE #{ num } < RNUM
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT post_id, member_id, thumbnail, likes, cmts FROM sns_post WHERE member_id in ( SELECT following_id FROM follow WHERE follower_id = #{ memberId } )

SELECT m.member_id, m.role, m.nickname, m.profile_img, m.intro, ( SELECT COUNT(post_id) FROM sns_post WHERE member_id = m.member_id ) POST_CNT,
( SELECT COUNT(follower_id) FROM follow WHERE following_id = m.member_id ) FOLLOWER_CNT,
( SELECT COUNT(following_id) FROM follow WHERE follower_id = m.member_id ) FOLLOWING_CNT
FROM member m WHERE m.member_id = #{ memberId }

SELECT mem.profile_img, mem.role, k.* FROM member mem, ( SELECT nvl2(m.target_id, 1, 0) like_status, c.* FROM sns_post c, ( SELECT * FROM jjim WHERE target_type = 2 AND member_id = null #{ memberId } ) m, ( SELECT COUNT(*)JJIM, target_id FROM jjim WHERE target_type = 2 GROUP BY target_id ) x WHERE c.post_id = m.target_id(+) AND c.post_id = x.target_id(+) ) k
WHERE mem.member_id = k.member_id AND post_id = #{ postId } ORDER BY post_id
SELECT post_id, file_name FROM sns_media WHERE post_id = #{ postId } ORDER BY file_name

SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(hobbies, '[^,]+', 1, Level) hobbies FROM member WHERE hobbies is not null AND member_id = #{ memberId } CONNECT BY LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT(hobbies, '[^,]+') AND PRIOR member_id = member_id AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <=5
mapper.update: MERGE INTO hashtag h USING (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(hashtag, '[^,]+', 1, Level) hashtag FROM sns_post WHERE hashtag IS NOT NULL AND post_id = #{ postId } CONNECT BY LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT(hashtag, '[^,]+') AND PRIOR post_id = post_id AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL ) p ON (h.hashtag = p.hashtag) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET h.use_count = h.use_count+1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(h.hashtag) VALUES(p.hashtag)
